org.restlet
Interface Maplet

All Superinterfaces:
Restlet
All Known Subinterfaces:
RestletContainer
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMaplet, DefaultRestletContainer
public interface Maplet
extends Restlet

Mapper of calls to other restlets. Automatic delegation is provided for attached restlets.

Method Summary
 void attach(String pathPattern, Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
          Attaches a restlet class.
 void attach(String pathPattern, Restlet restlet)
          Attaches a restlet instance shared by all calls.
 void delegate(RestletCall call)
          Delegates a call to attached restlets.
 void detach(Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
          Detaches a restlet class.
 void detach(Restlet restlet)
          Detaches a restlet instance.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.restlet.Restlet
getContainer, handle
 

Method Detail

attach

void attach(String pathPattern,
            Restlet restlet)
Attaches a restlet instance shared by all calls.

Parameters:
pathPattern - The path pattern used to map calls.
restlet - The restlet to attach.
See Also:
Pattern

attach

void attach(String pathPattern,
            Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
Attaches a restlet class. A new instance will be created for each call.

Parameters:
pathPattern - The path pattern used to map calls.
restletClass - The restlet class to attach (must have a constructor taking a RestletContainer parameter).
See Also:
Pattern

detach

void detach(Restlet restlet)
Detaches a restlet instance.

Parameters:
restlet - The restlet to detach.

void detach(Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
Detaches a restlet class.

Parameters:
restletClass - The restlet class to detach.

              throws RestletException
Delegates a call to attached restlets.

Parameters:
